trans-unit.source: powershell,cmdlet,jea
trans-unit.target: powershell,cmdlet,jea

trans-unit.source: README
trans-unit.target: 讀我檔案

trans-unit.source: Just Enough Administration
trans-unit.target: Just Enough Administration

trans-unit.source: Just Enough Administration (JEA) is a security technology that enables delegated administration for anything that can be managed with PowerShell.
trans-unit.target: Just Enough Administration (JEA) 是安全性技術，允許將可透過 PowerShell 管理的任何項目委派管理。

trans-unit.source: With JEA, you can:
trans-unit.target: 使用 JEA，您可以︰

trans-unit.source: **Reduce the number of administrators on your machines** by leveraging virtual accounts that perform privileged actions on behalf of regular users.
trans-unit.target: 利用虛擬帳戶，代表一般使用者執行特殊權限動作，以**減少電腦上的系統管理員數目**。

trans-unit.source: **Limit what users can do** by specifying which cmdlets, functions, and external commands they can run.
trans-unit.target: 指定使用者可以執行的 Cmdlet、函式和外部命令，以**限制使用者可以執行的工作**。

trans-unit.source: **Better understand what your users are doing** with "over the shoulder" transcriptions that show you exactly what commands a user executed during a session.
trans-unit.target: 透過 "Over The Shoulder" 文字記錄，顯示使用者在工作階段期間實際執行的命令，以**深入了解使用者正在執行的工作**。

trans-unit.source: Why is this important?
trans-unit.target: 為何重要？

trans-unit.source: Consider the common scenario where your DNS servers are co-located with your Active Directory Domain Controllers.
trans-unit.target: 假設在一般情況下，您的 DNS 伺服器會與 Active Directory 網域控制站共置。

trans-unit.source: Your DNS administrators need to have local administrator privileges to fix issues with the DNS server, but in order to do so you have to make them members of the highly privileged "Domain Admins" security group.
trans-unit.target: 您的 DNS 系統管理員必須具有本機系統管理員權限，才能修正 DNS 伺服器的問題，但若要這樣做，您必須將其設為具有高度權限之 "Domain Admins" 安全性群組的成員。

trans-unit.source: This approach effectively gives DNS Administrators control over your whole domain and access to all resources on that machine.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法能有效地讓 DNS 系統管理員控制您的整個網域，並存取該電腦上的所有資源。

trans-unit.source: With JEA in place, you can configure a role for your DNS administrators that gives them access to all the commands they need to get their job done, but nothing more.
trans-unit.target: 有了 JEA，您就可以設定 DNS 系統管理員的角色，並讓他們只存取完成其工作所需的所有命令。

trans-unit.source: This means you can provide the appropriate access to repair a poisoned DNS cache without unintentionally giving them rights to Active Directory, or to browse the file system, or run potentially dangerous scripts.
trans-unit.target: 這表示您可以提供適當的存取權以修復有害的 DNS 快取，卻不會無意中給予他們使用 Active Directory、瀏覽檔案、或執行有潛在危險指令碼的權限。

trans-unit.source: Better yet, when the JEA session is configured to use one-time privileged virtual accounts, your DNS administrators can connect to the server using *unprivileged* credentials and still be able to run privileged commands.
trans-unit.target: 更棒的是，當 JEA 工作階段設定為使用一次性特殊權限虛擬帳戶時，您的 DNS 系統管理員就可以在使用*非特殊權限*認證連接到伺服器的情況下，仍然能夠執行特殊權限命令。

trans-unit.source: Availability
trans-unit.target: 可用性

trans-unit.source: JEA is being developed in parallel to Windows Server 2016, and is available on older versions of Windows through Windows Management Framework updates.
trans-unit.target: JEA 是與 Windows Server 2016 同期開發的功能，舊版 Windows 可透過 Windows Management Framework 更新來使用這項功能。

trans-unit.source: The current release of JEA is available on the following platforms:
trans-unit.target: 目前的 JEA 版本適用於下列平台︰

trans-unit.source: Windows Server
trans-unit.target: Windows Server

trans-unit.source: Windows Server 2016 Technical Preview 4 and higher
trans-unit.target: Windows Server 2016 Technical Preview 4 及更新版本

trans-unit.source: Windows Server 2012 R2, 2012, and 2008 R2\* with [Windows Management Framework 5.0](https://www.microsoft.com/en-us/download/details.aspx?id=50395) installed
trans-unit.target: 安裝 [Windows Management Framework 5.0](https://www.microsoft.com/en-us/download/details.aspx?id=50395) 的 Windows Server 2012 R2、2012 和 2008 R2\*

trans-unit.source: Windows Client
trans-unit.target: Windows 用戶端

trans-unit.source: Windows 10 with the November Update (1511) installed
trans-unit.target: 安裝的 11 月更新 (1511) 的 Windows 10

trans-unit.source: Windows 8.1, 8, and 7\* with [Windows Management Framework 5.0](https://www.microsoft.com/en-us/download/details.aspx?id=50395) installed
trans-unit.target: 安裝 [Windows Management Framework 5.0](https://www.microsoft.com/en-us/download/details.aspx?id=50395) 的 Windows 8.1、8 和 7\*

trans-unit.source: Support for virtual accounts in JEA sessions is currently not available on Windows Server 2008 R2 or Windows 7.
trans-unit.target: Windows Server 2008 R2 或 Windows 7 目前不提供 JEA 工作階段中的虛擬帳戶支援。

trans-unit.source: Explore the experience guide
trans-unit.target: 探索體驗指南

trans-unit.source: Ready to learn how to author, deploy, and use your own JEA endpoint?
trans-unit.target: 準備好了解如何撰寫、部署及使用您專屬的 JEA 端點了嗎？

trans-unit.source: This guide gets you started quickly with a pre-built JEA endpoint to get an idea of what the end-user experience is like, then walks you through recreating an endpoint from scratch to help demonstrate concepts like session configurations and Role Capabilities.
trans-unit.target: 本指南可讓您快速開始使用預先建置的 JEA 端點，以了解使用者體驗，然後逐步引導您從頭開始重新建立端點，以利示範工作階段設定和角色功能等概念。

trans-unit.source: Start authoring your own JEA endpoints
trans-unit.target: 開始撰寫您自己的 JEA 端點

trans-unit.source: It's easy to author a JEA endpoint -- all you need is a JEA-enabled system and a text editor (like PowerShell ISE).
trans-unit.target: 撰寫 JEA 端點很容易，您只需要啟用 JEA 的系統和文字編輯器 (例如 PowerShell ISE)。

trans-unit.source: One helpful tip to get started is to create skeleton files using `New-PSRoleCapabilityFile -Path <path>` and `New-PSSessionCapabilityFile -Path <Path>` without any other arguments.
trans-unit.target: 一個實用的入門秘訣是使用 `New-PSRoleCapabilityFile -Path <path>` 和 `New-PSSessionCapabilityFile -Path <Path>`但不提供任何其他引數來建立基本架構檔案。

trans-unit.source: These skeleton files contain all of the applicable configuration fields along with helpful comments to explain what each field can be used for.
trans-unit.target: 這些基本架構檔案包含所有適用的設定欄位，以及說明每個欄位可能用途的實用註解。

trans-unit.source: To make authoring JEA endpoints even easier, check out the [JEA Toolkit Helper](http://blogs.technet.com/b/privatecloud/archive/2015/12/20/introducing-the-updated-jea-helper-tool.aspx) which provides a GUI with which you can author Session Configuration and Role Capability files.
trans-unit.target: 若要更輕鬆地撰寫 JEA 端點，請參閱 [JEA Toolkit Helper](http://blogs.technet.com/b/privatecloud/archive/2015/12/20/introducing-the-updated-jea-helper-tool.aspx)，其提供可用來撰寫工作階段設定檔和角色功能檔案的 GUI。

trans-unit.source: It even supports generating Role Capabilities based on PowerShell logs to start you off with the commands your users regularly run to get their jobs done.
trans-unit.target: 甚至支援根據 PowerShell 記錄檔產生角色功能，讓您一開始就有使用者為完成工作所經常執行的命令。
